snippet: The crisis over tons of contaminated water at the plant, crippled two years ago by an earthquake and tsunami, has worsened.
abstract: High levels of radiation are found near storage tanks at Japan's Fukushima Daiichi nuclear plant, raising possibility of additional leaks; Prime Min Shinzo Abe says government will step in to help get plant under control.
lead_paragraph: The crisis over tons of contaminated water at the plant, crippled two years ago by an earthquake and tsunami, has worsened.

headline.main: Radiation Near Japanese Plant’s Tanks Suggests New Leaks
headline.print_headline: Radiation Near Japanese Plant’s Tanks Suggests New Leaks
